whyVerifyEmail.question: Why do I need to verify my email?
whyVerifyEmail.answer: Email verification ensures that only the intended recipient can claim the allocated tokens. It adds an extra layer of security to prevent unauthorized claims.

needEth.question: Do I need ETH for gas fees?
needEth.answer: No! The claim portal covers all gas fees. You don't need any ETH in your wallet to receive your GOC tokens.

noVerificationCode.question: I didn't receive the verification code. What should I do?
noVerificationCode.answer: Check your spam folder first. If you still don't see it, wait a few minutes and try again. The system only sends codes if an allocation exists for your email.

preventAbuse.question: How do you prevent abuse and multiple claims?
preventAbuse.answer: We use multiple security measures including rate limiting, captcha verification, email hashing, and one-time claim enforcement to prevent abuse.
